content.rendered:
[vc_row el_class=”masonry-portfolio location-portfolio” css=”.vc_custom_1563615609227{padding-top: 50px !important;padding-bottom: 70px !important;}”][vc_column css=”.vc_custom_1515636297694{padding-top: 0px !important;}”][vc_row_inner equal_height=”yes” content_placement=”middle” gap=”25″][vc_column_inner width=”1/2″ offset=”vc_col-lg-8 vc_col-md-6″]

[/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/2″ offset=”vc_col-lg-4 vc_col-md-6″]

Our Unique Small Business Website Development Process

If you are one of the business owners in Moorabbin, whether you are in the industrial or retail business, Confetti Design’s expert web design services allow you to level up your business by creating a stunning website! Imagine having a strong online presence not only in Moorabbin but also in Melbourne and the entire world. Chat with us and explore a whole new possibility for your business!

[vc_empty_space height=”15px”][vc_column_text]VIEW MORE OF OUR WORK[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row row_content_width=”grid” css=”.vc_custom_1513007553262{padding-top: 5% !important;padding-bottom: 5% !important;background-position: center !important;background-repeat: no-repeat !important;background-size: cover !important;}” el_class=”confetti-sep”][vc_column]
[vc_column_text el_class=”text-not-caps”]

Confetti Design services in Moorabbin

[/vc_column_text][vc_empty_space][vc_column_text css=”.vc_custom_1564469730443{padding-right: 5% !important;padding-left: 5% !important;}”]

We will help you build your e-commerce website from ground up. Our retail and e-commerce experience is invaluable in helping your business be a success.

[/vc_column_text][vc_empty_space height=”25px”][vc_separator color=”custom” el_width=”10″ accent_color=”#ca0043″][vc_empty_space height=”65px”]

[vc_row_inner el_class=”services-location”][vc_column_inner width=”1/4″]

Web Design

[vc_column_text]Looking for good designers and professional developers? Confetti Design offers a hands on design and development Service that will help you accomplish an amazing client experience resulting in great conversions.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/4″]

Branding

[vc_column_text]We provide more than just website development, your branding matters and we can ensure you present a consistent online brand. Making sure all your customer touch-points present the same brand messaging and visuals is our passion.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/4″]

SEO

[vc_column_text]Getting your site within the first 3 positions on the first page of Google is every businesses goal. We ensure your website goes live with best practise optimisation and then if you are serious about ranking we can help. Our SEO partner is the best Melbourne based Search Engine Optimisation company we know.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/4″]

Shopify Developer

[vc_column_text]Shopify is one of the best platforms for e-commerce, no doubt and we are the right people to help you with your online business.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width=”stretch_row” css=”.vc_custom_1563672626485{padding-top: 50px !important;padding-bottom: 50px !important;background-color: #ffffff !important;}” el_class=”location-slider-portfolio”][vc_column css=”.vc_custom_1563592372523{padding-top: 0px !important;}”]

The 4 most important pages your Moorabbin website should have

[vc_column_text]

Having a website unlocks the potential of your business simply because you have a wider audience who can view what you offer 24 by 7. Taking the time to study and design the most important parts of your website for your Moorabbin business can give you the results you’re expecting.

As a professional website development agency in Melbourne, Confetti Design knows that there are key areas every website owner should pay attention to for it to get the results you’re expecting. We listed the areas and pages that you need special attention on when starting your Moorabbin website.

We’ve heard the saying “first impressions last” so many times, and it is always true specially now that we live in a fast-paced, digital world. Every business has its corresponding competition, and most likely your business in Moorabbin shares the same fate. Hence, getting that excellent “first impression” from your potential customers will be what competing businesses will aim for.

Confetti Design is the best website design company for your Moorabbin website to make it look extraordinary!

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width=”stretch_row_content_no_spaces” equal_height=”yes” css=”.vc_custom_1563603813437{padding-top: 0px !important;padding-bottom: 0px !important;background-position: center !important;background-repeat: no-repeat !important;background-size: cover !important;}” el_class=”text-white steps location-factors”][vc_column width=”1/4″ css=”.vc_custom_1563604136910{margin-top: 0px !important;margin-bottom: 0px !important;padding-top: 100px !important;padding-right: 5px !important;padding-bottom: 100px !important;padding-left: 5px !important;background-image: url(https://confettidesign.com.au/wp-content/uploads/2017/08/steps_01.jpg?id=10889) !important;background-position: center !important;background-repeat: no-repeat !important;background-size: cover !important;}” el_class=”text-bg1 text-plus”][vc_column_text css=”.vc_custom_1564469923050{margin-right: 5% !important;margin-bottom: 0px !important;margin-left: 5% !important;}”]

Home page

Of course, our number one page is the home page or landing page of your website. This is the face of your entire website. This part of your website should be flawless and engaging as you only have 0.05 seconds to impress your visitors when they browse through your home page. Your home page should tell your story at a glance.

If you want an eye-catching website for your Moorabbin business, Confetti Design’s web design and development services is the best choice. Our clients’ home pages are not only engaging, but we ensure that they are also functional at the same time.

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/4″ css=”.vc_custom_1563604143056{margin-top: 0px !important;margin-bottom: 0px !important;padding-top: 100px !important;padding-right: 5px !important;padding-bottom: 100px !important;padding-left: 5px !important;background-image: url(https://confettidesign.com.au/wp-content/uploads/2017/08/steps_02.jpg?id=10890) !important;background-position: center !important;background-repeat: no-repeat !important;background-size: cover !important;}” el_class=”text-bg2 text-plus”][vc_column_text css=”.vc_custom_1564470030004{margin-right: 5% !important;margin-bottom: 0px !important;margin-left: 5% !important;}”]

About page

When you have prospective clients scanning your brand-new website, their instinctive action is to verify your legitimacy. Your About page, stating how your Moorabbin business started and who you are, gives them the chance to get to know your business better. Once you start building that trust with your potential customers, you’re just a few steps away from that conversion.

Confetti Design creates amazing About pages that tells your story, building your reputation in your line of business.

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/4″ css=”.vc_custom_1563604148917{margin-top: 0px !important;margin-bottom: 0px !important;padding-top: 100px !important;padding-right: 5px !important;padding-bottom: 100px !important;padding-left: 5px !important;background-image: url(https://confettidesign.com.au/wp-content/uploads/2017/08/steps_03.jpg?id=10891) !important;background-position: center !important;background-repeat: no-repeat !important;background-size: cover !important;}” el_class=”text-bg3 text-plus”][vc_column_text css=”.vc_custom_1564470098780{margin-right: 5% !important;margin-bottom: 0px !important;margin-left: 5% !important;}”]

Contact page

When visiting websites, nothing is more annoying than trying to look for the contact information of the business owners or their customer support. Its such a waste of time to build up the anticipation of your visitors and making them really interested about your online store in Moorabbin, only to lose them since they don’t know how to contact you. Confetti Design not only does the best website designs in Melbourne, but we also make sure that your contact page stands out.

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/4″ css=”.vc_custom_1563604156298{margin-top: 0px !important;margin-bottom: 0px !important;padding-top: 100px !important;padding-right: 5px !important;padding-bottom: 100px !important;padding-left: 5px !important;background-image: url(https://confettidesign.com.au/wp-content/uploads/2017/07/steps_04aaa.jpg?id=11317) !important;background-position: center !important;background-repeat: no-repeat !important;background-size: cover !important;}” el_class=”text-bg4″][vc_column_text css=”.vc_custom_1564470138312{margin-right: 5% !important;margin-bottom: 0px !important;margin-left: 5% !important;}”]

Testimonials page

The best way that you can earn your visitors’ trust is when another customer vouches for your products and services! Creating a testimonial page gives your potential customers a preview on what you are offering—not just the products and services you offer, but the entire experience of dealing with your business. They create an emotional connection with your visitors, painting a picture of what to expect from your business. Confetti Design creates engaging testimonials page that catches the attention of your future clients.

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width=”stretch_row” css=”.vc_custom_1563672634345{padding-top: 5% !important;padding-bottom: 5% !important;background-color: #ffffff !important;background-position: center !important;background-repeat: no-repeat !important;background-size: cover !important;}” el_class=”confetti-sep gray-bg”][vc_column][vc_column_text css=”.vc_custom_1563672955784{padding-top: 0px !important;padding-bottom: 10px !important;}”]

Testimonials

[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text css=”.vc_custom_1564542505142{padding-top: 0px !important;padding-bottom: 5% !important;}”]

Confetti Design caters to clients from Moorabbin, Caufield, Black Rock, and nearby areas. Our unparalleled web design and development services have proven to work with our clients!

Below are small business web design testimonials from clients in Moorabbin and surrounding Bayside suburbs

[/vc_column_text][vc_row_inner el_class=”testimonial-location”][vc_column_inner css=”.vc_custom_1563673835832{margin-top: 50px !important;margin-bottom: 50px !important;padding-right: 0px !important;padding-left: 0px !important;}”]

Stacey Currie

I had been quoted from $1k to $10k, I had no idea who to trust. Luckily I was referred by someone I trust 100%, who trust Johannah 100%, and I know why. I am very grateful.

Stacey Currie

I still can’t believe my vision is here; I feel extremely proud of my new website and branding. I felt embarrassed of my old branding but now I am so proud to share what Johannah and the team created.

Personal Brand Expert

One feature I loved was Johannah's availability and prompt response to any query no matter how big or small. Confetti's service is always with genuine smile and her positive attitude and outlook made the process fun!

Suzie Lightfoot

Coach Central

I am impressed with how well Johannah nailed my brief without one face-to-face meeting. I highly recommend her to create a website you will love.

Cindy Turner

Wedding Honey

Johannah has produced a beautiful and effective new website for our small business in a short amount of time. Her professionalism, kindness and encouragement is appreciated.

Ray & Sharon Tolcher

Miei Fiori

Johannah took her time to understand our vision before coming back with suggestions that not only meet our requirements but are relevant, current and forward in it's application.

Rob Greca & Lyly Greca

Sarah Trevathan Coach

The process has been stress-free and actually very enjoyable! I'm also delighted with the finished result of my website.

Sarah Trevathan

What's My Style

I regularly receive compliments on my branding, website and the stunning business cards and cannot recommend Johannah and Confetti Designs highly enough.

Nicky McMillan
[/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_empty_space height=”60px”][vc_column_text]

Contact us for an instant over-the-phone quote.

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row]
